text:
In order to keep themselves looking as youthful as ever, the host of Live with Kelly and Ryan reportedly participates in a strange pre-show ritual so they look fresh-faced just before the cameras start rolling!

According to the National Enquirer, Ryan Seacrest allegedly dunks his face into ice water before facing the ABC cameras.

This reportedly keeps the media mogul’s face looking young and fresh.

Reportedly, Ryan Seacrest (with Kelly Ripa) participated in a strange pre-show ritual in order to keep his face looking fresh. (Credit: ABC)

Read more: Kelly Ripa And Her Husband Enjoy Double Date With Ryan Seacrest And Girlfriend

A source close to Ryan is reportedly quoted as saying to The National Enquirer, “Our host with the most is well known for taking ice baths, but he long ago learned that even barring the baths, the most important pretty-boy technique is religiously dunking his kisser in freezing cold water just before going on camera!”

Girlfriend Shayna Taylor recently appeared alongside Kelly and Ryan on "Live." (Credit: ABC)

Read more: Kardashian Family Lying To Fans

Ryan, who hosts not only Live, but American Idol and his own radio show, needs to look as fresh-faced as possible in order to keep himself viable not only to his fans, but the industry as well.

He is also dating a younger woman, Shayna Taylor, a model, fitness advocate, and chef.

Ryan wears many hats, including hosting a daily radio show, "On Air with Ryan Seacrest." Kelly Ripa guested on an episode. (Credit: Instagram/@kellyripa)

"Shayna's amazing and she's fun. I'm lucky to be in the same room as she is," he's said of their relationship.

Said Kelly Ripa of her new BFF Ryan to E!, "He could be penniless, but he is just a good soul. He's a good person and he cares about people. He's authentic. It's not an act," she explained.

Kelly is enamored of Ryan, calling him "a good soul." (Credit: ABC)

"This is who he is. He's a tireless worker. He's incredibly empathetic. He's empathetic to women's causes and women's issues in a way that I'm just… He never ceases to amaze me," she gushed of her cohost.

Live with Kelly and Ryan airs weekdays on ABC.
